ca.corefacility.gview.map.controllers

Class BackboneStyleController

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.corefacility.gview.map.controllers.Controller
      • ca.corefacility.gview.map.controllers.BackboneStyleController

  • public class BackboneStyleController
extends Controller
    This class is responsible for controlling access to the backbone style.
    Author:
    Eric Marinier
